result.arabic_text: ۞ وَمَن يُسۡلِمۡ وَجۡهَهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ فَقَدِ ٱسۡتَمۡسَكَ بِٱلۡعُرۡوَةِ ٱلۡوُثۡقَىٰۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
result.translation: 22. Qofkii isu dhiiba isagoo dhan Alle (adeeca, baarri u ah) oo ah samo fale, wuxuu dhab ahaan qabsaday guntin adag (aan go'eyn). Alle baana loo celiyaa cidhibta arrimaha oo idil.
